TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs

Docs.summary: Fornece dados para eventos de mouse gerados por um sempre que o mouse é movido dentro de um .

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs> classe fornece dados para o seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> eventos:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick>
## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#160)]
